entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
